original_title: Kamukuwaká: A História Sagrada do Povo Alto Xinguano
overview: Kamukuaká, the sacred cave of the Upper Xingu people, from which the Pohoká ritual and other important aspects of the life and culture of these people originate, is today outside the demarcated territory.  Today located in the territory of farmers, it can no longer be protected by its original guardians.
title: Kamukuwaká: A História Sagrada do Povo Alto Xinguano
